contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name =Xanl覺qlar |settlement_type=Municipality |native_name = |pushpin_map =Azerbaijan |pushpin_mapsize =300 |coordinates_region = AZ |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{flag|Azerbaijan}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Administrative divisions of Azerbaijan|Autonomous republic]] |subdivision_name1 =[[Nakhichivan Autonomous Republic|Nakhchivan]] |subdivision_type2 = [[Administrative divisions of Azerbaijan|Rayon]] |subdivision_name2 =[[Sharur Rayon|Sharur]] |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_total_km2 = |area_footnotes = |population_as_of = |population_total =2049 |population_footnotes ={{citation needed|date=October 2010}} |population_density_km2 = |timezone =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset = +4 |timezone_DST =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset_DST = +5 |latd=39 |latm=30 |lats=10 |latNS=N |longd=45|longm=01 |longs=43 |longEW=E |coordinates_display = inline,title |elevation_m = |area_code = |website = }} '''Xanl覺qlar''' (also, '''Khanlykhlar''', '''Khanlyklar''', and '''Khannykhlar''') is a village and municipality in the [[Sharur Rayon]] of [[Nakhichivan Autonomous Republic|Nakhchivan]], [[Azerbaijan]]. It has a population of 2,049. == References == *{{GEOnet2|32FA88150AD83774E0440003BA962ED3}} {{Sharur Rayon}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xanliqlar, Nakhchivan}} [[Category:Populated places in Sharur District]] {{Nakhchivan-geo-stub}}
